name: sea surface height
dataset_description: Parameters include dynamic sea surface height, sea surface height without the inverse barometer (IB) correction from atmospheric pressure loading, the IB correction from atmospheric pressure loading itself, and model sea level. The sea surface height fields include corrections for global mean steric height associated with global mean density changes in the Boussinesq volume-conserving model (i.e., the Greatbatch correction) and for sea-ice pressure loading.

name: ocean bottom pressure
dataset_description: Parameters include ocean bottom pressure with and without the contribution from atmospheric pressure loading, ocean bottom pressure anomalies with respect to their 2005-2010 means, and hydrostatic ocean bottom pressure anomaly. Note: ocean bottom pressure fields are provided in terms of equivalent water height.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface freshwater fluxes
fields: EXFpreci, EXFevap, EXFroff, EXFempmr, oceFWflx, SIatmFW, SFLUX, SIacSubl, SIrsSubl, SIfwThru, SIsnPrcp
dataset_description: Parameters include freshwater flxues from precipitation, evaporation, runoff, and sublimation across the air/ocean and air/sea-ice/snow interfaces.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface heat fluxes
fields: EXFhl, EXFhs, EXFlwdn, EXFswdn, EXFqnet, oceQnet, SIatmQnt, TFLUX, EXFswnet, EXFlwnet, oceQsw, SIaaflux
dataset_description: Parameters include latent, sensible, and short- and longwave radiative heat fluxes across the air/ocean and air/sea-ice/snow interfaces.

name: atmosphere surface state
fields: EXFatemp, EXFaqh, EXFpress, EXFuwind, EXFvwind, EXFwspee
dataset_description: Parameters include atmosphere temperature, humidity, pressure, winds in the model x and y-directions, and total wind speed.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface stress
dataset_description: Parameters include surface wind stress on the ocean and sea-ice surfaces in the model x and y-directions, and total ocean surface stress including contributions from sea-ice drag.

name: sea-ice and snow concentration and thickness
dataset_description: Parameters include sea-ice concentration, mean sea-ice and snow thickness, and sea-ice pressure loading.

name: sea-ice velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include sea-ice velocity in the model x and y-directions.

name: ocean temperature and salinity
dataset_description: Parameters include seawater potential temperature and salinity.

name: ocean density, stratification, and hydrostatic pressure
dataset_description: Parameters include seawater density, vertical stratification, and hydrostatic pressure accounting.

name: ocean velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include ocean velocity in the model x, y, and z-directions.

name: Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include the Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus velocity in the model x, y, and z-directions.

name: ocean three-dimensional parameterized mixing coefficients
dataset_description: Parameters include the time-invariant three-dimensional coefficients for vertical diffusivity, Gent-McWilliams cross-isopycnal diffusivity, and Redi along-isopycnal diffusivity.

name: sea-ice and snow horizontal volume fluxes
dataset_description: Parameters include the horizontal volume fluxes of sea-ice and snow in the model x- and y-directions.

name: Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus transport streamfunction
dataset_description: Parameters include the ocean bolus transport streamfunction in the model x- and y-directions.

name: ocean three-dimensional volume fluxes
dataset_description: Parameters include the three dimensional ocean volume fluxes in the model x, y, and z-directions. Volume fluxes are calculated by multiplying ocean velocities with wet grid cell areas (i.e., horizontal fluxes account for partial cells and the time-varying vertical coordinate).

name: ocean three-dimensional potential temperature fluxes
fields: ADVx_TH, DFxE_TH, ADVy_TH, DFyE_TH, ADVr_TH, DFrE_TH, DFrI_TH
dataset_description: Parameters include the three dimensional advective and diffusive ocean potential temperature fluxes in the model x, y, and z-directions. Horizontal fluxes account for partial cells and the time-varying vertical coordinate.

name: ocean three-dimensional salinity fluxes
fields: ADVx_SLT, DFxE_SLT, ADVy_SLT, DFyE_SLT, ADVr_SLT, DFrE_SLT, DFrI_SLT, oceSPtnd
dataset_description: Parameters include the three dimensional advective and diffusive ocean salinity fluxes in the model x, y, and z-directions. Horizontal fluxes account for partial cells and the time-varying vertical coordinate.

name: sea-ice salt plume fluxes
dataset_description: Parameters include the salt mass flux from sea-ice salt plumes per unit area (g m-2 s-1) and the depth of the salt plumes.
comment: oceSPflx is salt mass flux per unit area (g m-2 s-1), not salinity flux.

name: ocean three-dimensional momentum tendencies in the model x-direction
fields: TOTUTEND, Um_Cori, Um_Advec, Um_Diss, Um_Ext, Um_dPhiX, AB_gU, Um_ImplD
dataset_description: Parameters include XYZ.

name: ocean three-dimensional advective momentum tendencies in the model x-direction
ocean three-dimensional dissipative momentum tendencies in the model x-direction
ocean three-dimensional momentum tendencies in the model y-direction
fields: TOTVTEND, Vm_Cori, Vm_Advec, Vm_Diss, Vm_Ext, Vm_dPhiY, AB_gV, Vm_ImplD

name: ocean three-dimensional advective momentum tendencies in the model y-direction
ocean three-dimensional dissipative momentum tendencies in the model y-direction
sea-ice thermodynamic budget
fields: SIFao, SIFionet, SIFianet, SIFmi, SIFFlood, SIsnAccR, SIsnmltS, SIgamma
